meanings.sent1: The buckskinned cowboy rode his horse into the sunset.
meanings.sent2: She admired the buckskinned jacket displayed in the store window.
meanings.sent3: The buckskinned hiker looked like a character from an old Western movie.
meanings.sent4: The buckskinned warrior moved swiftly through the forest, blending with the trees.
meanings.sent5: The buckskinned outfit was rough to the touch but warm in the cold weather.
